metaTitle: VILLAS MARTINA Fuente Álamo | 3-Bed Villas From €354,900
metaDescription: Discover VILLAS MARTINA in Fuente Álamo, Murcia. Modern 3-bedroom villas from €354,900. Built by OREESOL. Delivery 2026. Premium coastal living.

content.heroIntro: VILLAS MARTINA represents a exceptional opportunity to own a contemporary villa in one of Murcia's most sought-after developments. Located in the prestigious Hacienda del Alamo area of Fuente Álamo, these carefully designed 3-bedroom villas combine modern architecture with practical family living. Developed by the trusted OREESOL builder, each villa features 108m² of thoughtfully planned living space set on generous 600m² plots, offering privacy and potential for personal landscaping. With delivery scheduled for September 2026, VILLAS MARTINA positions you perfectly to capture the region's growing property market while enjoying a lifestyle that bridges Mediterranean charm with contemporary convenience. Starting from €354,900, these villas represent outstanding value—40% less expensive than comparable Spanish island markets—making them an intelligent investment for both primary residence seekers and savvy buy-to-let investors.

locationSection.intro: Hacienda del Alamo in Fuente Álamo has emerged as one of Murcia's most vibrant residential communities, attracting a diverse population of international residents and Spanish families alike. This established area combines the tranquility of suburban living with excellent proximity to essential amenities, major transport links, and world-class leisure facilities. The region benefits from a Mediterranean climate, featuring over 300 days of sunshine annually. An established international community ensures English is commonly spoken, making integration seamless for foreign buyers. The area's infrastructure continues to develop, with modern healthcare facilities, quality educational institutions, and comprehensive shopping options all within easy reach. Fuente Álamo itself has transformed into a thriving hub that respects its agricultural heritage while embracing modern development, creating an authentic Spanish lifestyle without sacrificing comfort or convenience.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Non-residents follow the same processes as Spanish nationals. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and may benefit from local legal representation. VILLAS MARTINA welcomes international buyers, and the established expat community provides excellent support for newcomers.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs of approximately 8-10% including transfer tax, notary fees, and registration. At VILLAS MARTINA's €354,900 starting price, total acquisition costs would be roughly €383,000-€390,000. These are standard costs for all Spanish property purchases. We recommend consulting with a local legal advisor for a complete breakdown specific to your purchase.
